name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

flavorText: When several of these Pokemon gather, their electricity can cause lightning storms.

strengths: Thunder Jolt deals impressive 30 damage for just 2 Energy on a Basic Pokemon
Gnaw provides energy-efficient 10 damage with any Energy type
Can evolve into the powerful Raichu for added versatility
Low retreat cost of 1 allows easy switching
Strong against Water-type Pokemon which are common in the format
weaknesses: Low 40 HP makes it vulnerable to one-hit knockouts
Thunder Jolt has 50% chance to deal self-damage, reducing sustainability
Fighting weakness leaves it exposed to popular Fighting Pokemon
No resistance to offset defensive weaknesses
Self-damage from Thunder Jolt can accumulate quickly
synergies: Use PlusPower with Thunder Jolt to reach important knockout thresholds
Pair with Potion or Super Potion to heal self-inflicted damage
Combine with Defender to survive one extra hit given the low HP
Evolve into Raichu when Pikachu takes too much self-damage
counters: Onix - High HP tanks Thunder Jolt and Fighting typing exploits weakness
Machop - Fighting weakness means quick defeats
Sandshrew - Fighting type advantage and decent HP
